typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as integer,
		Column_2 as date,
		Column_3 as integer,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as integer,
		Column_7 as integer,
		Column_8 as integer,
		Column_9 as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	multiLineRow: true) ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		DateKey as integer,
		FullDateAlternateKey as date,
		DayNumberOfWeek as integer,
		EnglishDayNameOfWeek as string,
		SpanishDayNameOfWeek as string,
		FrenchDayNameOfWeek as string,
		DayNumberOfMonth as integer,
		DayNumberOfYear as integer,
		WeekNumberOfYear as integer,
		EnglishMonthName as string,
		SpanishMonthName as string,
		FrenchMonthName as string,
		MonthNumberOfYear as integer,
		CalendarQuarter as integer,
		CalendarYear as integer,
		CalendarSemester as integer,
		FiscalQuarter as integer,
		FiscalYear as integer,
		FiscalSemester as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		DateKey = Column_1,
		FullDateAlternateKey = Column_2,
		DayNumberOfWeek = Column_3,
		EnglishDayNameOfWeek = Column_4,
		EnglishMonthName = Column_5,
		MonthNumberOfYear = Column_6,
		CalendarQuarter = Column_7,
		CalendarYear = Column_8,
		CalendarSemester = Column_9
	),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2),
	dateFormat:'MM/dd/yyyy',
	timestampFormat:'MM/dd/yyyy') ~> sink1
